title: Understanding Global Learning Strategies of Emerging Market Enterprises

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational economic concepts and general understanding of international trade
context.additional_context: Learning that combines smartphone-based digital materials with offline discussions to analyze growth strategies of emerging market enterprises through case studies

learning_goals: Learners will explain at least three growth factors of emerging market multinational enterprises (EMNEs)
Learners will analyze how corporate environments (political, regulatory, social norms) influence global strategies through case studies
Learners will classify government-business collaboration strategies for knowledge-based industry development into two types (mergers & acquisitions, global collaboration)

resources: Local Business Case Study Videos (5 minutes or less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
